faq.question: What is IR Prime?
faq.answer: IR Prime is an exclusive subscription programme that gives subscribers access to exclusive content not available to the general public.

faq.question: Is IR Prime Membership free?
faq.answer: Initially, IR Prime Members get access to a limited number of free content, after which they must choose between any of our subscriptions plans. i.e. Silver, Gold, Platinum

faq.question: What do I get with an IR Prime membership?
faq.answer: Benefits included in the IR Prime membership depends on the category of membership opted for. For instance, Silver members get …

faq.question: Will my IR Prime membership get automatically renewed?
faq.answer: For subscribers who signed up using iOS and Androids who paid via Apple account or Google Play, the membership will get renewed automatically at the end of the subscription period. Subscribers who bought IR Prime through desktop, mobile web or Android via our payment gateway, will have to manually renew their membership before it ends.

faq.question: How do I stop my membership?
faq.answer: Subscribers can cancel their membership before the end of their membership period so it doesn’t get automatically renewed.
